content:
Thanks for the great call yesterday and special thanks to @Cooper Thompson for scribing and updating the notes. I have a couple of follow up questions as I prepare for the next call...

  1. @Drew Torres stated that there were only a few key things that the customer wanted to know from a client supplied information .... one was the source _ e.g from patient vs device vs another provider and what were the other things? ( I recall it being a small list of 2 or 3 things)
  2. We were planning to invite client implementers to the call to share their capabilities and review our current approach. @Cooper Thompson can you let me know and I can forward them an invite to the next call?

Proposed agenda for next week's 6/2 Meeting is:

  • Review Last Week
  • Enabling Provenance
  • Client perspective !

Meeting agenda/notes including call coordinates : https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=113672432 ( Feel free to comment/edit )

Reminder Jitsi meeting is: https://meet.jit.si/argo2021.write

Proposed agenda for next week's 6/16 Meeting is:

  • Review Last Week
  • Finalize Scope/Use Cases
  • How to represent the data reliability

Meeting agenda/notes including call coordinates :https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=113672502 ( Feel free to comment/edit )

So roll up your sleeves and attend the Jitsi meeting at: https://meet.jit.si/argo2021.write
